name: Macaron AI
tagline: The AI that instantly gets you and cooks up mini-apps
description: Macaron is a personal AI you'll click with from the very first chat. It remembers your preferences, experiences, and desires far better than a friend, and can instantly cook up personalized mini-apps to make the conversation sweeter.

name: Anything
tagline: Agent that ships mobile apps & web. Everything built in
description: Anything is the world's best agent for making products without coding. Ships mobile apps, web, or both. Designs that don't look AI-made. Everything built in, no extra tools needed.

name: Snowglobe
tagline: Simulate real users to test your AI before launch
description: Snowglobe is a simulation environment for LLM teams to test how their applications respond to real-world user behavior. Run full workflows through realistic scenarios, catch edge cases early, and confidently improve before deploying to production.

name: Comet by Perplexity
tagline: Browse at the speed of thought
description: Comet is a web browser built for today‚Äôs internet, transforming search into an interactive, context‚Äërich journey. With advanced generative algorithms and a sleek design, Comet delivers swift, precise answers that empower smarter decisions.

name: CoSupport AI
tagline: AI support agents that don‚Äôt hallucinate, live in 10 mins
description: Tired of bots giving wrong answers? CoSupport AI handles up to 90% of repeat tickets with 99% accuracy. Train it on your content, connect to Zendesk, Intercom, Freshdesk, Salesforce, and more ‚Äî unlimited replies, no babysitting.

name: Dub Partners
tagline: Modern affiliate platform & network for SaaS
description: Dub Partners is the all-in-one affiliate marketing platform and network for SaaS. Trusted by modern companies like Framer, Superhuman, Perplexity, and more.

name: DeepReel
tagline: The first AI agent that is your personal video creation team
description: Turn blogs, docs, or ideas into polished, presenter-led videos in minutes. DeepReel writes the script, sources visuals, adds voiceover, music & captions ‚Äî you tweak, publish, and grow. Scale video marketing without scaling workload.

name: FirstUser.app
tagline: Guaranteed feedback on your product launch
description: 90% of launches get little to no feedback. FirstUser connects you with other builders so you always get thoughtful, actionable reviews - before or after your Product Hunt launch. Give feedback to earn it back.

name: Memorae
tagline: Boost your productivity with Whatsapp
description: Memorae is an AI‚Äëpowered personal assistant that works within WhatsApp. It allows users to create, manage, and receive reminders, tasks, calendars, and lists seamlessly via messages or voice notes. Google Calendar sync and media-based task input supported.

name: Ally Solos Glasses
tagline: The most accessible AI assistant, now wearable
description: Ally Solos Glasses: lightweight smart glasses with a camera, powered by Ally, the most accessible AI assistant, designed for blind and low vision. Interact with your environment, read menus, and recognize objects, people, and more ‚Äî just by talking.

name: Addicted
tagline: Break your bad habits in a fun way
description: Here you have this new fun app which will help you break your addiction by fighting with your inner monsters. Track your addictions and collect willpower points which will be your weapon to defeat the monsters.

name: Hana Connect
tagline: AI that connects people dealing with the same struggles.
description: A voice-first peer support platform that hand-matches you with people who‚Äôve lived through what you‚Äôre facing bipolar, chronic pain, OCD, and more. No apps, no logins, just real conversations.

name: LangRead
tagline: Read books, learn languages one word at a time
description: LangRead is a web app that gradually swaps words in your book with your target language, letting you learn as you read. Accept each word, see translations and definitions, and track your progress. Works with PDF, EPUB and Kindle formats.

name: Tripsy 3.5
tagline: The new way to collaborate on travel plans
description: Seven years ago, we made it easy to plan trips with friends & family. Now, Tripsy takes collaboration further. Designed for couples, families, friends, or tour groups. Favorite Guests, Activities by Guest and much more on this update!

name: RunAnywhere
tagline: Ollama but for mobile, with a cloud fallback
description: The only on-device AI platform that intelligently routes LLM requests, tracks costs in real-time, provides near-instant latency, and maintains privacy.

name: Private Mind
tagline: Local, private AI that fits in your pocket
description: Private Mind represents a new era of AI‚Äîpowerful, personal, and completely offline. Built around the belief that AI should live entirely on your device, Private Mind opens the door to a new kind of experience: fast, secure, and fully private.

name: Toggles for Outlook
tagline: Automate Outlook emails in seconds
description: Toggles for Outlook helps teams send complete, client-ready emails in one click without leaving Outlook. Automate templates, attachments, signatures, recipients, and subject lines in seconds while keeping full control.

name: Video Mania
tagline: Prompting game for AI video to become a video prompt master
description: üèÜ Think you can master the hardest prompt game? Learn AI video prompting, direct your own cinematic creations üé•, and race to the top of the leaderboard for glory (and prizes). Come prompt with us!

name: HeyTaco Milestones for Slack
tagline: Celebrate Birthdays & Work Anniversaries Automatically
description: Automatically celebrate your team's special days in Slack ‚Äî no spreadsheets, no reminders. Just fun, personalized messages, tacos üåÆ, and shared moments that make your team feel seen and appreciated.

name: Hunyuan-GameCraft
tagline: Interactive game worlds from a single image
description: Hunyuan-GameCraft by Tencent is an open-source model for generating playable, high-dynamic game videos from a single image and user actions. It offers fine-grained control and impressive realism for creators and developers.
